alert.note: Alert for Floyd (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 04 at 8:29PM EST until January 05 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia... Oostanaula River at US 27 at Rome affecting Floyd County. ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Georgia... Etowah River at Canton affecting Cherokee County. For the Oostanaula River Basin...including Resaca, Calhoun, Calhoun, Armuchee, Rome, Rome, Rome, Rome...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Etowah River Basin...including Landrum, Russell Creek downstream of Head Lake Dawsonville, Dawsonville, Dawsonville, Dawsonville, Matt, Ball Ground, Canton, Old GA 5 below Ball Ground, Canton, Canton, Waleska, Woodstock, Noonday Creek above Chastain Meadows Pkwy Marietta, Woodstock, Woodstock, Kennesaw, Acworth, Allatoona Dam above Cartersville, Rockmart, Cartersville, Dallas, Kingston, Kingston, Rome, Rome...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Oostanaula River at US 27 at Rome. * WHEN...From late tonight to tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 25 feet, Flood stage is reached. Minor flooding occurs in the woodlands and fields along the river upstream and downstream from the gage on the Turner McCall bridge or U.S. Highway 27. The Heritage Park Rome Greenway continues to flood with some locations up to 5 feet deep. All drainage valves must be closed at the outfalls in Rome. The flood gate on the Rome levee should be closed. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 PM EST Wednesday the stage was 22.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 25 feet just after midnight tonight. - Flood stage is 25 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
